operation.name: Insert
operation.sql: INSERT INTO user_qts_updates (user_id, qts, update_type, update_data, date2) VALUES (:user_id, :qts, :update_type, :update_data, :date2)

operation.name: SelectLastQtsByUserId
operation.sql: SELECT qts FROM user_qts_updates WHERE user_id = :user_id ORDER BY qts DESC LIMIT 1
